mapper.select: select mem_idx, order_num, item_num, item_amount, item_name, item_price, order_status, date_format(order_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as order_date,item_thumb,orderlist_idx from orderlist where mem_idx=#{memIdx} and refund_yn = 'N' order by orderlist_idx desc

select r.review_idx, o.orderlist_idx, o.item_name, o.mem_idx, o.order_num, o.item_thumb, r.item_num, r.review_write_yn, r.review_contents, date_format(o.order_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as order_date ,date_format(r.review_writeDate, '%Y.%m.%d') as review_writeDate from review r left join orderlist o on r.order_num = o.order_num where r.mem_idx =#{memIdx} and o.refund_yn = 'N' and r.review_write_yn = 'N' and o.order_status = '구매확정' order by order_date desc
mapper.update: update review set review_contents = #{reviewContents}, review_write_yn = 'Y', review_writeDate = now() where orderlist_idx = #{orderlistIdx}
mapper.select: select review_idx, item_num , item_name,review_contents from review where review_idx = #{reviewIdx}
